text: Green Book is a 2018 American biographical comedy-drama movie directed by Peter Farrelly. The movie was inspired by the true story of a tour of the Deep South by African Americans. == References == Category:English-language movies Category:2018 LGBT movies Category:2018 drama movies Category:2010s buddy movies Category:2010s biographical movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:American drama movies Category:American buddy movies Category:American biographical movies Category:LGBT drama movies Category:Best Picture Oscar Category:DreamWorks Pictures movies Category:Movies about racism Category:Movies featuring a Best Supporting Actor Academy Award-winning performance Category:Movies set in Alabama Category:Movies set in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Movies set in Louisiana Category:Movies set in Manhattan Category:Movies set in Mississippi Category:Movies set in New York (state) Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in North Carolina Category:Movies set in Ohio Category:Movies set in Pennsylvania Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Green Book (movie)
